mapper.select: select p.posting_idx, p.title, s.store_name from editor_scrap es join posting p on es.posting_idx = p.posting_idx join store s on p.store_idx = s.store_idx where p.state='1' order by posting_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into editor_pick( PICK_IDX, ORIGINAL_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, START_DATE, END_DATE, POSTING_IDX ) values( pick_seq.nextval, #{originalName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{postingIdx} )
mapper.select: SELECT pick_idx, start_date, end_date, posting_idx, title, store_name FROM ( SELECT pick_idx, start_date, end_date, posting_idx, title, store_name, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT ep.pick_idx, ep.start_date, ep.end_date, ep.posting_idx, p.title, s.store_name FROM editor_pick ep JOIN posting p ON p.posting_idx = ep.posting_idx JOIN store s ON p.store_idx = s.store_idx WHERE p.state = '1' ORDER BY ep.pick_idx DESC ) inner_sub ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startIndex} + 1 AND #{startIndex} + #{pageSize} ORDER BY pick_idx DESC

select posting_idx, title, store_name from ( select posting_idx, title, store_name, ROWNUM AS rnum from ( select p.posting_idx, p.title, s.store_name from editor_scrap es join posting p on es.posting_idx = p.posting_idx join store s on p.store_idx = s.store_idx where p.state='1' order by p.posting_idx desc ) inner_sub ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startIndex} + 1 AND #{startIndex} + #{pageSize} ORDER BY posting_idx DESC
select count(editor_scrap_idx) from editor_scrap es JOIN posting p ON p.posting_idx = es.posting_idx where p.state = '1'
select count(ep.pick_idx) from editor_pick ep JOIN posting p ON p.posting_idx = ep.posting_idx where p.state = '1'
select p.posting_idx, p.title, s.store_name from posting p join store s on p.store_idx = s.store_idx where p.state='1' and posting_idx = #{postingIdx} order by posting_idx desc
mapper.update: update editor_pick set ORIGINAL_NAME=#{originalName}, FILE_PATH=#{filePath}, FILE_SIZE=#{fileSize}, START_DATE=#{startDate}, END_DATE=#{endDate}, POSTING_IDX=#{postingIdx} where pick_idx=#{pickIdx}
